bio:
Hello,


I am Kaushal K. Sharma. 

ABOUT: 
I am from India and currently living in Greater Noida, a most planned and a future city, adjacent to the capital of India, New Delhi.

QUALIFICATIONS: 
I am holding dual specialized master degrees in Information Technology - M.Tech-IT and M.B.A-IT. I am currently working with www.lancePRENEURS.com.

EXPERIENCES: 
I am having 9+ years of experience with various roles and responsibilities. I have worked as Trainer, Web and Mobile Application Developer, Team Lead, E-Learning Consultant and Project Manager with a few major IT Companies in INDIA and handled the global clients as well. 

As a freelancer, I had already worked on various projects with VWorker, which is now the Freelancer.com and always got the good ratings with my +ve and satisfied project delivery on time.

I AM A lancePRENEUR: 
My interest and hobby switched me to work at guru. I joined this guru.com for more open areas to work on. I believe you will surely find some work to provide me. I love to do various things like consulting, training, writing, online research, marketing, sales, blogging, photography etc.

To know more about, kindly see my profile at my blog (www.kaushalksharma.wordpress.com) or  you can give me a call for an instant reply.


-Thank You,
Kaushal k. Sharma
I am a lancePRENEUR @ www.lancePRENEURS.com

Cell: +91-886-0000-393 | +91-886-000-939

E-Mail: 
sharma.kaushalk@lancepreneurs.com
contact@lancepreneurs.com

Address:
Omicron-II,
Greater Noida – 201310, UP
INDIA

bio: I have 25 years experience working with a wide variety of art media. I have fulfilled the expectations of every client. I am easy to work with, happy to make changes, and am dedicated to each project I am assigned.My Clients Say:"It was truly a pleasure to work with Anne Weiss! She created beautiful, Jewish art work for our school hallways. Not only are they works of art, but usable as well. our teachers can take each piece, interact with it in their classrooms and then hang it back on the wall. What an innovative way to connect kids to art! Thanks Anne for your vision and beauty." - Dale"Annie Weiss just did the decorations for my son's Bar Mitzvah and she made the whole process so easy. She not only is an  talented artist, but during a very busy and stressful time for us came up with a brilliant master plan of what our event should look like including place cards, sign in board, gift bags, and a logo to fit the occasion that my son really loves! She has constantly come up with soluti

My ideal work conditions dictate a pay rate minimum of $25.00/hour or better. I expect to be able to show the work I do for a client in my portfolio. I am honest and ethical, and expect payment through safepay.
